text: WRAD is an oldies formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Radford, Virginia, serving Pulaski and Montgomery counties in Virginia. WRAD used to be owned and operated by Cumulus Media, Inc. On September 6, 2018, Cumulus Media announced it will sell its Blacksburg cluster to Monticello Media.Cumulus Sells Blacksburg Cluster To Monticello Media The sale was approved December 1, 2018.Six areas radio stations sold ==Translator== ==References== ==External links== * * RAD Category:Radio stations established in 1950 Category:1950 establishments in Virginia Category:Oldies radio stations in the United States
title: WRAD (AM)
